cause.description:
We are here to spread the word, "This is a revolution we shall not leave this world the same"-PB,Were here to revolutionize humanity and refocus the perspectives of Unbelievers. We shall keep Faith LIVE and spread the good news to people and fulfill the things of this world. Keep God's Kingdom to the fullest and Make the purpose of our lives fulfill in this world by Spreading the word of the living God.
1. Position #1
cause.mission: To be Livin' Proof of our saviour because what he has done in our lives, by spreading the Word of the living Godto our friends!!!
cause.name: Help The World Notice Jesus
